title: A Fragile X Treatment May Be On The Horizon
description: Katie Clapp and Michael Tranfaglia's son was born with a genetic disorder that affects brain development. It makes it hard to learn language and basic daily tasks and often is accompanied by a host of other disorders.  To help find a cure, they started a foundation and raised research money.  After several setbacks, one treatment is showing promise.  NPR neuroscience reporter Jon Hamilton tells Emily Kwong the story.
